mapper.select: select * from house where house_type = #{type} order by house_no
SELECT MIN(FILE_NO) AS FILE_NO, HOUSE_NO, MIN(ORIGIN_NAME) AS ORIGIN_NAME, MIN(CHANGE_NAME) AS CHANGE_NAME, MIN(UPLOAD_DATE) AS UPLOAD_DATE, MIN(STATUS) AS STATUS FROM HOUSE_IMG GROUP BY HOUSE_NO
SELECT H.HOUSE_NO ,H.HOUSE_PRICE ,H.HOUSE_RENT ,H.HOUSE_SQUARE ,H.HOUSE_STYLE ,H.HOUSE_TYPE ,H.HOUSE_FLOOR FROM OWN O JOIN HOUSE H ON O.HOUSE_NO = H.HOUSE_NO WHERE O.ES_NO=#{esNo} AND O.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT H.HOUSE_NO ,H.HOUSE_PRICE ,H.HOUSE_RENT ,H.HOUSE_SQUARE ,H.HOUSE_STYLE ,H.HOUSE_TYPE ,H.HOUSE_FLOOR FROM OWN O JOIN HOUSE H ON O.HOUSE_NO = H.HOUSE_NO WHERE O.ES_NO=#{esNo} AND O.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT MIN(H.FILE_NO) AS FILE_NO ,H.HOUSE_NO ,MIN(H.CHANGE_NAME) AS CHANGE_NAME ,MIN(H.UPLOAD_DATE) AS UPLOAD_DATE ,MIN(H.STATUS) AS STATUS FROM HOUSE_IMG H JOIN OWN O ON O.HOUSE_NO = H.HOUSE_NO WHERE O.ES_NO=#{esNo} AND O.STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY H.HOUSE_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM OWN O JOIN HOUSE H ON O.HOUSE_NO = H.HOUSE_NO WHERE O.ES_NO=#{esNo} AND O.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT HOUSE_NO ,CASE WHEN LENGTHB(TO_CHAR(HOUSE_PRICE)) >= 5 THEN TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(HOUSE_PRICE), 1, LENGTHB(TO_CHAR(HOUSE_PRICE)) - 4)) || '억' || TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(HOUSE_PRICE), -4)) ELSE TO_CHAR(HOUSE_PRICE) END AS HOUSE_PRICE ,HOUSE_RENT ,HOUSE_SQUARE ,HOUSE_STYLE ,HOUSE_TITLE ,HOUSE_DETAILS ,HOUSE_TYPE ,HOUSE_LATITUDE ,HOUSE_LONGITUDE ,HOUSE_UPLOAD_TIME ,HOUSE_ADDRESS ,HOUSE_FLOOR ,HOUSE_BUILDING_FLOOR ,HOUSE_TOILET ,HOUSE_ROOMS ,HOUSE_PARKABLE ,HOUSE_BALCONY ,HOUSE_MAINTAINCOST ,HOUSE_DOITNOW ,HOUSE_BUILDDATE ,HOUSE_ANIMALS ,STATUS FROM HOUSE WHERE HOUSE_NO = #{houseNo}
SELECT * FROM HOUSE_IMG WHERE HOUSE_NO = #{houseNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT HOUSE_NO ,CASE WHEN LENGTHB(TO_CHAR(HOUSE_PRICE)) >= 5 THEN TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(HOUSE_PRICE), 1, LENGTHB(TO_CHAR(HOUSE_PRICE)) - 4)) || '억' || TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(HOUSE_PRICE), -4)) ELSE TO_CHAR(HOUSE_PRICE) END AS HOUSE_PRICE ,HOUSE_RENT ,HOUSE_SQUARE ,HOUSE_TITLE ,HOUSE_ADDRESS ,HOUSE_DETAILS ,HOUSE_TOILET ,HOUSE_ROOMS ,HOUSE_ANIMALS ,HOUSE_PARKABLE FROM HOUSE WHERE TRIM(SUBSTR(HOUSE_ADDRESS, INSTR(HOUSE_ADDRESS, '동') - 2, 3)) = TRIM(SUBSTR(#{houseAddress}, INSTR(#{houseAddress}, '동') - 2, 3)) AND STATUS='Y' ORDER BY HOUSE_NO

SELECT MIN(I.FILE_NO) AS FILE_NO, I.HOUSE_NO, MIN(I.ORIGIN_NAME) AS ORIGIN_NAME, MIN(I.CHANGE_NAME) AS CHANGE_NAME, MIN(I.UPLOAD_DATE) AS UPLOAD_DATE, MIN(I.STATUS) AS STATUS FROM HOUSE_IMG I JOIN HOUSE H ON (I.HOUSE_NO = H.HOUSE_NO) WHERE TRIM(SUBSTR(H.HOUSE_ADDRESS, INSTR(H.HOUSE_ADDRESS, '동') - 2, 3)) = TRIM(SUBSTR(#{houseAddress}, INSTR(#{houseAddress}, '동') - 2, 3)) GROUP BY I.HOUSE_NO ORDER BY I.HOUSE_NO
select * from house where house_type = #{type} order by house_price FETCH FIRST 7 ROWS ONLY

SELECT H.HOUSE_NO ,H.HOUSE_TITLE FROM HOUSE H JOIN JJIM J ON J.HOUSE_NO = H.HOUSE_NO WHERE J.USER_NO = #{userNo}
